title: TypeInitializationException occuring in ASP.Net MVC, only in Azure
body:
I have a ASP.NET MVC website project that uses Skiasharp.
It is working well locally.
Recently I tried to publish it to Azure. When running from Azure, this website generates an exception at startup:

The version of the native libSkiaSharp library (80.2) is incompatible with this version of SkiaSharp. Supported versions of the native libSkiaSharp library are in the range [88.0, 89.0).

 My whole solution is using v2.80.3
ASP.Net MVC project itself references:
  <package id="SkiaSharp" version="2.80.3" targetFramework="net47" />
  <package id="SkiaSharp.Views.Desktop.Common" version="2.80.3" targetFramework="net47" />

ASP.Net MVC project references library projects that reference nugets (if I write the union of all projects):
- SkiaSharp 
- Skiasharp.Views
- Skiasharp.Views.Desktop.Common
- SkiaSharp.Views.Forms
- SkiaSharp.Views.GTK2
- SkaSharp.Views.WindowsForms
- SkiaSharp.Views.WPF

all in v2.80.3
